subject: [Mhln] DREAMWEAVER CS3 READY TO DOWNLOAD
body:
The greatest problem you have is your greatest opportunity.

So many fail because they don't get started -- they don't go. They don't overcome inertia. They don't begin.

The cross of the Legion of Honor has been conferred on me. However, few escape that distinction.

Other people's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.

I hate it in friends when they come too late to help.

Like pilgrims to the appointed place we tend The world's an inn, and death the journey's end.

Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.

We are the greatest power in the world. If we behave like it.

Reality forms around a commitment.

The truly generous is the truly wise, and he who loves not others, lives unblest.

Socialism is a vast machine for churning out piles of goods marked ''Take it or leave it. ''

On an occasion of this kind it becomes more than a moral duty to speak one's mind. It becomes a pleasure.

Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
